articles.title: Alcohol consumption surged during the pandemic — and deaths followed - The Washington Post
articles.description: U.S. consumption of alcohol, which had already been increasing for years, accelerated during the pandemic as Americans grappled with stress and isolation.

articles.title: Black men have a higher risk of death from melanoma - The Root
articles.description: The American Academy of Dermatology found that Black men have a higher risk of death from melanoma.
articles.content: Theres a longstanding myth that Black people dont need sunscreen. But this latest finding could encourage Black men to start lathering up this Summer. A new study published in the American Academy of… [+1671 chars]

articles.title: BMI is an 'imperfect' way to measure health. But replacing it is complicated - CBC News
articles.description: Last month, the American Medical Association (AMA) formally recognized BMI’s shortcomings and created a new policy advising caution when using it.
articles.content:
